imdb.title: Yûgiô: 5D's
imdb.plot: This Yu-Gi-Oh spinoff explores more serious themes. The story takes place in a dystopian future where Domino City has been divided into Neo Domino and the Satellite sector after a tragic incident. Satellite residents are looked do...

episodes.title: Bound to the Future, Bonds to Our Companions
episodes.plot: With Team Raganrok beaten, Team 5D's can move to face Team New World in the finals. Carly decides to write up an article and struggles until Akiza, Luna, and Leo show up to help.

episodes.title: The Beginning of the End
episodes.plot: The grand finale of the World Racing Grand Prix is set to start, and our two finalists -Team 5D's and Team New World - are ready to take center stage. For Yusei, Jack and Crow, second place isn't an option because a victory lap for Team New World means New Domino City is doomed!

episodes.title: Dawn of the Machines
episodes.plot: It's one down and two to go for Team 5D's as Jack and his mighty Red Nova Dragon get set to take on and take out Primo and Jakob of Team New World!

episodes.title: Against All Odds
episodes.plot: With Jack out of commission, all eyes turn to Crow as he swoops in to duel Jakob! Does Crow have what it takes to take down Team New World's best duelist, or will Crow suffer the same cruel fate that sent his teammate crashing into defeat?

episodes.title: For Synchro's Sake
episodes.plot: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance, Yusei Fudo from Team 5D's looks to rev it up against Team New World's Jakob in the final round of the World Racing Grand Prix!

episodes.title: Fight for the Future: Part 1
episodes.plot: After witnessing Jakob, Primo and Lester fuse together to form the all-powerful Aporia, Yusei must now figure out a way to defeat this formidable foe before he destroys New Domino City!

episodes.title: Fight for the Future: Part 2
episodes.plot: Yusei struggles against Aporia and Cubic. Jack and Crow chase after them into the city while Aporia continues discussing his despair. Yusei makes one last gamble with Shooting Star Dragon

episodes.title: An Approaching Terror - The Citadel of God, "The Ark Cradle"
episodes.plot: Despite Aporia's defeat, the Circuit is completed and the Ark Cradle appears in the sky. On a collision course for New Domino City. Sherry then contacts the group, having sided with the enigmatic Z-ONE.

episodes.title: The Suspension Bridge Towards the Future - The Rainbow Bridge Bitfrost!
episodes.plot: With only 12 hours until the Ark Cradle crashes and despite Sherry's threat, Team 5D's resolves to stop Z-ONE. Team Ragnarok then arrive, offering their assistance for Team 5D's to board the Ark Cradle.

episodes.title: The Enchanting Field - École de Zone!
episodes.plot: Team 5D's manages to board the Ark Cradle and split up. Akiza and Crow end up encountering Sherry, who has joined Z-ONE to accomplish her wish. She then uses a special card against the pair.

episodes.title: The Soul-Binding Gate! The Sealed Future!
episodes.plot: Sherry hopes to use Z-ONE to rewrite history so that her family isn't killed. Offering the same to Akiza and Crow, the two nevertheless resolve to fight for the future against Sherry.

episodes.title: The Duel of Despair! Fortissimo the Mobile Fortress!
episodes.plot: Jack, Leo, and Luna end up encountering a revived Aporia, who is prepared to stop all three of them. He begins a life or death battle with them, using a strategy to inflict intense agony to the three.

episodes.title: A Life-or-Death Battle! Machine Divine Emperor Dragon Asterisk
episodes.plot: In the exciting conclusion to the World Racing Grand Prix, Yusei Fudo, facing his toughest opponent ever, must rev it up one last time if he hopes to defeat Aporia and save New Domino City from being destroyed!

episodes.title: The Miracle of Life! Life Stream Dragon!!
episodes.plot: Leo is resurrected by the Crimson Dragon as the sixth Signer alongside his Life Stream Dragon, facing Aporia once more. Elsewhere, Bruno and Yusei reach the final gate.

episodes.title: The Beginning of the End: A Struggle to the Death for the Future!
episodes.plot: Bruno reclaims his true identity as Antinomy and faces Yusei in a desperate clash. Determined to save mankind, he unleashes the full power of his Accel Synchro against a confused Yusei.

episodes.title: Faster Than Light!!
episodes.plot: Antinomy uses Delta Accel Synchro to summon an even stronger monster to push Yusei into a corner. Between Antinomy and the black hole, things appear hopeless for Yusei.

episodes.title: The Last Human - Z-ONE
episodes.plot: The gang finally approach Z-ONE, who reveals this has all been part of his plan to change the future. He prepares to fight them when Aporia, inspired by the power of hope, appears to stop Z-ONE.

episodes.title: A Hope Bound for the Future!
episodes.plot: Aporia desperately tries to defeat his former friend, but Z-ONE manages to destroy him. Inheriting his will and everyone else's, Yusei steps up to stop Z-ONE once and for all.

episodes.title: Just One Chance to Turn It All Around
episodes.plot: Yusei and Z-ONE continue their aerial battle around the Ark Cradle. Armed with all the Signer Dragons, Yusei offers an intense resistance against Z-ONE's Timelords.

episodes.title: The Revived Hero
episodes.plot: Z-ONE reveals that he tried to emulate Yusei as a hero in the future, only for the world to fall to ruin. Having gone back in time, Z-ONE is determined to prevent that future, even if it means sacrificing New Domino City.

episodes.title: Feelings Entrusted of My Father
episodes.plot: Z-ONE unleashes the full fury of his Timelords against Yusei. Yusei can barely hold back his attack and the crumbling Arc Cradle, when all of a sudden he hears the voice of his father.

episodes.title: Gathering Wishes
episodes.plot: Yusei pulls off the impossible and summons the powerful Shooting Quasar Dragon. Z-ONE responds by summoning his Sephiron as the two heroes clash one final time for the fate of the future.

episodes.title: An Advancing Future
episodes.plot: Peace has returned to New Domino City as Team 5D's prepared to go their separate ways. That is when Jack, who aims to be the greatest duelist in the world, challenges Yusei to one final duel.

episodes.title: Clashing Souls!
episodes.plot: Yusei and Jack, lifelong friends and rivals, continue their last duel. As everyone else watches, the two continue to turn the tables until their Dragons are summoned to the field.

episodes.title: Shining Forth to the Future
episodes.plot: The duel between Yusei and Jack finally comes to an end. Which of them will claim victory? And what shall become of the Signers as they prepare for their futures?

episodes.title: Knight Takes Pawn
episodes.plot: In the second round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Crow of Team 5D's gets set to take on Team Catastrophe's Herman. Can Crow swoop in and swipe all of Herman's life points, or will Herman's Hook the Hidden Knight clip Crow's wings and send him and Team 5D's into a tailspin?

episodes.title: Rook Takes Knight
episodes.plot: With his life points on the line, Crow of Team 5D's looks to give Herman's Hook the Hidden Knight the heave-ho before it ruins his Runner and catapults Team Catastrophe into the next round.

episodes.title: Primo's Plan, Part 1
episodes.plot: Primo and his Duel Bot Army crash the World Racing Grand Prix, putting the tournament and New Domino City in jeopardy.

episodes.title: Primo's Plan, Part 2
episodes.plot: Primo decides to take matters into his own hands by challenging Yusei Fudo to a duel after watching Yusei interfere with his Duel Bot Army's mission of mechanized mayhem.

episodes.title: Primo's Plan, Part 3
episodes.plot: Hoping to stop New Domino City from spiraling into total chaos, Yusei takes on Primo and his Meklord Emperors' debilitating ability to absorb Synchro Monsters.

episodes.title: Primo's Plan, Part 4
episodes.plot: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance and Primo in control of Stardust Dragon, Yusei must figure out a way to get his go-to card back before his life points hit zero.

episodes.title: Primo's Plan, Part 5
episodes.plot: It's the climactic conclusion to the battle between Yusei and Primo! Can Yusei defeat this menace and save his City, or will Primo prevail and send New Domino spiraling into chaos?

episodes.title: The Ancient Land - To Nazca!
episodes.plot: Greiger has a vision of Jack being destroyed by his own power and asks him to come to the Nazca Lines. Greiger fears that a powerful demon known as the Crimson Devil is responsible and tries to help Jack.

episodes.title: The Crimson Devil
episodes.plot: After his loss to Max, Jack goes off to sulk when a Familiar of the Crimson Devil, also known as Scar-Red Nova, appears. Hoping to use Jack as a sacrifice, he challenges Jack to a duel.

episodes.title: Blazing Soul! Scar-Red Nova Dragon
episodes.plot: 10,000 years ago Scar-Red Nova was sealed away and now schemes to break free. Jack refuses to give in during his battle with the Familiar and his blazing soul causes a miracle to happen.

episodes.title: Operation Capture Lazar
episodes.plot: Yusei and the others are struggling to learn more about Yliaster, so they attempt to track down Lazar. Lazar is afraid for the safety of his family though, and attempts to fight off Team 5D's.

episodes.title: Press Him About the Mystery!! The Endgame Turbo Duel!
episodes.plot: Lazar leads Team 5Ds to an arcade where an Yliaster database is hidden. However, the database is locked behind some puzzles and the gang only have three chances before the information is deleted.

episodes.title: The Ener-D Express Development Agency
episodes.plot: Yusei, Sherry, and Bruno infiltrate Momentum Express, which has ties to Yliaster. As Sherry and Bruno investigate the reactor, Yusei distracts company president Clark Smith through a duel.

episodes.title: The Distorted Past
episodes.plot: Clark uses the reactor to send Yusei, Bruno, and Sherry where they are flung through a strange dimension and lose Sherry. Making it home, they find Momentum Express gone as well as a strange island in the sky.

episodes.title: The New Rivals
episodes.plot: Leo runs into Team Taiyo, who are competing in the WRGP. He offers to help fix their D-Wheel, much to their chagrin. Meanwhile, Jack is challenged to a duel by Dragan of the mysterious Team Ragnarok.

episodes.title: The Invincible Scrum! Smash the Unbreakable Defense!
episodes.plot: Team 5Ds and Team Taiyo battle in the WRGP, beginning with Jack vs. Yoshizo. Despite having decks filled with Normal monsters, the three seem to have a more complicated plan with Hand Holding Genie.

episodes.title: Tie Those Feelings! The Hand Tied to the Majin!
episodes.plot: Jack defeats Yoshizo and continues fighting Junbei. Recalling that Team Taiyo began from humble beginnings, Junbei is determined to fulfill his dream using his, Taro's, and Yoshizo's combo.

episodes.title: The Miraculous Trump Card - Zushin the Sleeping Giant!
episodes.plot: Yusei figures out Team Taiyo's plan too late as Taro uses Zushin the Sleeping Giant against Crow. Crow begins to struggle against Zushin while the crowd begins to cheer for Team Taiyo.

episodes.title: Believe in the Power! The Strongest Giant Zushin VS Shooting Star Dragon
episodes.plot: It's the final round as Yusei goes up against Taro and his seemingly invincible Zushin. As Yusei gets closer and closer to defeat, he resolves to meet Taro and Team Taiyo's strong spirit.

episodes.title: Eyes on the Prize
episodes.plot: Yusei and Team 5D's get set to take on Team Ragnarok and their powerful Nordic Gods - Thor, Loki and Odin!

episodes.title: Duel for Redemption
episodes.plot: When Jack is informed by Team Ragnarok's Dragan that Director Goodwin fixed the match they had years earlier, Jack begins to doubt his Turbo Dueling talents. Can Jack kick things into overdrive and prove to himself that his abilities are legit, or will Dragan and his Nordic God, Thor, hammer home the fact that Jack's skills are nothing more than a mirage conjured up by Goodwin's greed?

episodes.title: Soul Solutions
episodes.plot: Determined to defeat Dragan and his Nordic God, Jack summons a mighty new monster to the field that has enough fire power to send all of Dragan's life points up in smoke!

episodes.title: When Nordic Gods Attack
episodes.plot: With only a handful of life points remaining and the Nordic God, Thor, staring down at him, Jack gets set to take on his next opponent - Team Ragnarok's Broder!

episodes.title: Tricking the Trickster
episodes.plot: After swooping in take on Team Ragnarok's Broder, Crow finds himself battling two Nordic Gods - Thor and Loki! Can Crow defeat these two dynamos, or will this dynamic duo prove to be too much for Crow and his battle-tested Blackwings?

episodes.title: Yusei's Last Stand
episodes.plot: With the tournament on the line, Yusei must find a way to defeat Halldor before the three Nordic Gods knock his life points down to nothing!

episodes.title: Fight to the Finish Line
episodes.plot: It's the exciting conclusion to the semifinal battle between Team Ragnarok and Team 5D's! Can Yusei Fudo muster a miracle comeback against Team Ragnarok's Halldor, or will Halldor and his Nordic Gods finish off Yusei for good and move on to the Grand Prix Finals?

episodes.title: A New Threat: Part I
episodes.plot: A mysterious new threat arrives on the scene in New Domino City, forcing Yusei to take to the streets and track down a rogue Turbo Duelist known as The Ghost.

episodes.title: A New Threat: Part 2
episodes.plot: With his life points on the line, Yusei must figure out a way to take down Ghost's Meklord Emperor Wisel before Wisel's special ability throws his game and his runner into a tailspin.

episodes.title: Lessons Learned
episodes.plot: When Vice Chancellor Rudolph Heitmann threatens to expel all the members of Leo and Luna's class from Duel Academy, Yusei attempts to teach the teacher a valuable lesson by challenging the Vice Chancellor to a duel to keep his friends in school.

episodes.title: Trash Talk
episodes.plot: When Crow is asked to convince an old friend of Martha's to move into her retirement home, Crow decides to tackle the task by challenging the old man to a trash-talking junkyard duel. Can Crow convince the old man to relocate, or will Bashford bash Crow's life points and send him and his deck packing instead?

episodes.title: A Duel with Interest
episodes.plot: When a loan shark starts sinking his teeth into New Domino City, Jack decides to reel in this money-grubbing menace for good by putting his most prized possessions on the line in a duel.

episodes.title: The Wicked Spirit
episodes.plot: When Leo and Luna decide to go exploring a nearby forest rumored to be haunted by wicked spirits, they soon discover that the rumors are all too real when a mysterious boy traps Luna in his house and challenges Leo to a duel.

episodes.title: French Twist: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yusei wakes up to find himself trapped in the back of a big rig with a bump on his head and no way out. After a mysterious tip leads Akiza to Yusei's location, the two friends soon find themselves Turbo Dueling an unfamiliar foe whose shocking identity stops Yusei and Akiza dead in their tracks.

episodes.title: French Twist: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the battle between Yusei and Sherry races on, Sherry reveals some shocking secrets about the upcoming World Racing Grand Prix. Meanwhile, Akiza begins to gain a new understanding and appreciation for Turbo Dueling while riding shotgun to Yusei.

episodes.title: Synchro Straits
episodes.plot: Before heading out to the event of the year - The World Racing Grand Prix Gala - Yusei challenges Jack to a Turbo Duel in the hopes of finding a new dueling strategy that doesn't involve the use of Synchro Monsters.

episodes.title: The Synchro Solution
episodes.plot: A mysterious duelist named Vizor offers to show Yusei a new dueling strategy known as The Synchro Solution.

episodes.title: Acceleration
episodes.plot: Akiza goes to get her Turbo Dueling license, but before she can drive off into the sunset, she first has to out-duel, out-maneuver and out-smart one of Sector Security's finest for her final exam.

episodes.title: Syd Is Vicious
episodes.plot: After a string of Duel Runner thefts has New Domino City on high alert, Jack Atlas decides to take justice into his own hands and ventures out in search of those responsible.

episodes.title: Dawn of the Duel Board: Part 1
episodes.plot: When a mysterious new student gives Luna a-one-of-a-kind Duel Board, Leo, trusting his instincts, steps up and tries to pull a 180 on their friendship.

episodes.title: Dawn of the Duel Board: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the Duel Board battle between Leo, Luna and the mystery duelist continues, Leo soon realizes that their mysterious opponent is actually an all-too-familiar friend.

episodes.title: Putting It All Together
episodes.plot: Jack and Crow set out to find a restless Yusei - hoping to ease his mind and reinforce the friendship they share by Turbo Dueling down memory lane.

episodes.title: The Super Genius
episodes.plot: A mysterious amnesiac helps Yusei build a new engine program for his Runner, but before they can test it out, a make-up-wearing, noodle-eating crook runs off with the file.

episodes.title: Get with the Program, Part 1
episodes.plot: Yusei and the gang trail Lazar to the local mall hoping to reacquire the engine design program that this window-shopping, noodle-eating crook stole from them.

episodes.title: Get with the Program, Part 2
episodes.plot: Yusei and Lazar are trapped in a warehouse where their only chance of escaping is if Yusei can outduel a Guard Bot whose CPU has been uploaded with all of Yusei's battle techniques.

episodes.title: Will the Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up, Part 1
episodes.plot: After being charged with crimes he didn't commit, Jack Atlas scrambles to uncover the truth before his friends and fans turn their back on him for good.

episodes.title: Will the Real Jack Atlas, Please Stand Up, Part 2
episodes.plot: With Jack Atlas on the run, Yusei and Crow set out in search of their pal, hoping to clear his good name before bad turns to worse.

episodes.title: Mother Knows Best
episodes.plot: When Zora's stubborn son Leon suddenly returns home, Crow picks a duel with him to help him realize that the ongoing quarrel he has with his mother is much ado about nothing.

episodes.title: Duelist for Hire
episodes.plot: When Yusei heads to a tumbleweed town at the request of some locals, he quickly finds himself in the middle of two feuding families - with his old friend Kalin right there with him!

episodes.title: Showdown at Sundown, Part 1
episodes.plot: When Yusei challenges Kalin to a duel, he hopes to save his old acquaintance from a terrible fate. However, the dueling gets dicey when it becomes clear that Kalin doesn't necessarily want to be saved!

episodes.title: Showdown at Sundown, Part 2
episodes.plot: As Yusei continues to duel his best to save Kalin from a most unhappy ending, he suddenly finds himself double crossed by his supposed allies and in desperate need of some saving of his own!

episodes.title: The Race to Escape, Part 1
episodes.plot: After being double crossed and sent to the mines by his supposed allies, Yusei hatches a plan to escape. Can Yusei find a way out, or will he and Kalin be forced to work the mines forever?

episodes.title: The Race to Escape, Part 2
episodes.plot: It's a high-speed minecart chase as Kalin and Yusei scramble to rescue Sergio's family from the clutches of the Crash Town mine. When Lawton and his goons gain up on the fleeing family, things take a heartbreaking turn, forcing Kalin to step up in ways he never expected.

episodes.title: Clash at Crash Town, Part 1
episodes.plot: The sinister Lawton has captured West and Nico and gained control of Crash Town, but Yusei and Kalin have no intention of letting him get away with it. It's the ultimate showdown as the dueling duo confront Lawton in a winner-takes-all battle.

episodes.title: Clash at Crash Town, Part 2
episodes.plot: As the clash between Lawton, Yusei and Kalin comes to a climactic close, Yusei and Kalin must figure out a way to defeat Lawton before his deck destroys their dreams of freeing everyone in the mines.

episodes.title: The Question of the Card
episodes.plot: When Sherry breaks into a city building in search of answers about a very special duel card, she finds a lot more than she bargained for.

episodes.title: Keeping a Promise, Part 1
episodes.plot: When Crow looks to avenge a missing colleague, he ends up finding an old friend who turns out not to be what he seems.

episodes.title: Keeping a Promise, Part 2
episodes.plot: Crow takes on an old friend in a duel to determine the truth about a colleague's mysterious disappearance.

episodes.title: Natural Instincts, Part 1
episodes.plot: A little fender bender turns into a friendly duel when Crow smashes into one of Team Unicorn's duelists on the tournament practice lanes... only this was no accident and Team Unicorn's intentions are anything but friendly.

episodes.title: Natural Instincts, Part 2
episodes.plot: New threats are on the horizon and no one can be trusted. Sherry arrives to inform Yusei that she suspects the sinister forces of Iliaster have infiltrated the tournament.

episodes.title: Power Plays
episodes.plot: Can Jack and his power-packed deck bring down his opponent or will Andre's secret plan place Jack and Team 5D's on the brink of elimination?

episodes.title: Trouble for Team 5D's
episodes.plot: With Team Unicorn taking the early lead against Team 5D's, all eyes turn to Akiza as she takes to the track hoping to take down Andre and even up the score.

episodes.title: The Edge of Elimination: Part I
episodes.plot: With Jack and Akiza already defeated, Yusei finds himself having to defeat all three members of Team Unicorn on his own. Can Yusei come up with a comeback that will wrangle the win away from Team Unicorn, or will he and Team 5D's be pushed to the edge of elimination?

episodes.title: The Edge of Elimination, Part 2
episodes.plot: Yusei must figure out a way to defeat all three members of Team Unicorn before his deck is drained of all its duel cards.

episodes.title: The Edge of Elimination, Part 3
episodes.plot: In the climactic conclusion to the first round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Yusei must figure out a way to defeat Team Unicorn's captain before all the cards in his deck disappear.

episodes.title: Party Crashers
episodes.plot: After snatching victory from the jaws of defeat in the first round of the World Racing Grand Prix, Team 5D's celebrates their win and prepares for their next opponent - Team Catastrophe.

episodes.title: A Web of Deceit: Part 1
episodes.plot: After defeating Jack to win the Fortune Cup Finale, Yusei is challenged to a Shadow Duel by an underground duelist whose mind has been taken over by the Dark Signers.

episodes.title: A Web of Deceit: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the battle between Yusei and his robed rival rages on, Yusei must rely on his deck if he plans to survive this Shadow Duel and uncover the truth behind the Dark Signers sinister scheme to destroy the Satellite Sector.

episodes.title: Good Cop, Bad Cop
episodes.plot: After agreeing to help Yusei meet with Director Goodwin, Officer Trudge unknowingly becomes one of the Dark Signers' drones and challenges a wounded Jack Atlas to a Shadow Duel.

episodes.title: Fight or Flight
episodes.plot: Hoping to gain Yusei's trust, Director Goodwin decides to share with him the secrets behind the origin of the Satellite Sector and the ongoing war between Signer and Dark Signer.

episodes.title: The Reunion Duel
episodes.plot: After returning to the Satellite Sector, Yusei meets up with his old friend Crow and soon finds himself in a tag team Turbo Duel with Sector Security.

episodes.title: Dark Signs: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yusei and Crow set off to confront the Dark Signers in an effort to stop them from destroying the Satellite Sector.

episodes.title: Dark Signs: Part 2
episodes.plot: In an effort to save the Satellite Sector from being destroyed, Yusei agrees to face off against a former friend turned Dark Signer in a Shadow Duel.

episodes.title: Dark Signs: Part 3
episodes.plot: With his life points on the line, Yusei confronts his former friend Kalin about their past in an effort to stop him from awakening the Army of Shadows.

episodes.title: Dark Signs: Part 4
episodes.plot: The safety of the world hangs in the balance as Yusei tries to figure out a way to outduel and outmaneuver the unstoppable power of Kalin's dark deck.

episodes.title: Supersensory Shakedown
episodes.plot: Leo is forced to take part in an extrasensory examination with the leader of the Arcadia Movement. Can Leo pass this pop quiz, or will this psychic showdown with Sayer leave Leo locked up forever?

episodes.title: Digging Deeper: Part 1
episodes.plot: Carly sets out hoping to uncover the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon, but after digging up some damaging dirt on the Arcadia Movement, she soon finds herself squaring off in a psychic duel with Sayer.

episodes.title: Digging Deeper: Part 2
episodes.plot: Sayer signs up for a Shadow Duel against a Dark Signer who's out for revenge while Akiza agrees to battle a dark and sinister supermodel.

episodes.title: Digging Deeper: Part 3
episodes.plot: As the Dark Signer double duel draws to a climactic close, Carly and Misty unfold a catastrophic card combo that could send Akiza and Sayer to the Netherworld forever.

episodes.title: Clash of the Dragons: Part 1
episodes.plot: After Akiza falls into a state of unconsciousness, her father turns to Yusei in a last ditch effort to wake his beloved daughter from her catatonic condition.

episodes.title: Clash of the Dragons: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the battle between Signers presses on, Yusei turns to his trusty Stardust Dragon in an effort to keep the power of Akiza's Black Rose Dragon at bay.

episodes.title: The Signs of Time
episodes.plot: With Yusei, Jack, Akiza and Luna all gathered together, Director Goodwin seizes the moment and decides to shed some light on the dark and formidable foes the four Signers will soon be battling.

episodes.title: Surely, You Jest: Part 1
episodes.plot: With Lazar's creepy clowns about to crack Crow's defense, Crow hatches a plan to lull his opponent into a false sense of security so that his feathered friends can swoop in and swipe the last of Lazar's life points.

episodes.title: Surely, You Just: Part 2
episodes.plot: With Lazar's creepy clowns about to crack Crow's defense, Crow hatches a plan to lull his opponent into a false sense of security so that his feathered friends can swoop in and swipe the last of Lazar's life points.

episodes.title: Mark of the Spider: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yusei gets caught up in a web of lies after agreeing to square off against Roman, the leader of the Dark Signers.

episodes.title: Mark of the Spider: Part 2
episodes.plot: With the safety of his friends literally hanging in the balance, Yusei must figure out a way to squash Roman's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him and his pals to the Netherworld forever.

episodes.title: Mark of the Monkey: Part 1
episodes.plot: Luna gears up to face Devack in a Shadow Duel, but before the first card can be thrown, Luna is transported back to the Spirit World, leaving her pint-sized brother Leo the tall task of taking down this Dark Signer.

episodes.title: Mark of the Monkey: Part 2
episodes.plot: As Luna searches the Spirit World for a way to free Ancient Fairy Dragon from her stone prison, Leo searches his deck for a card combo that will help him defeat Devack and his army of apes.

episodes.title: Mark of the Monkey: Part 3
episodes.plot: Luna and her new found friend Torunka hatch a plan to free Regulus from King Zeman's minus curse. Meanwhile, back in the Satellite Sector, Leo calls upon his Power Tool Dragon to help him dismantle Devack's dark deck.

episodes.title: Mark of the Monkey: Part 4
episodes.plot: When Luna's plan to free Ancient Fairy Dragon falls apart, Regulus must come to her rescue in order to save her and the Spirit World from Zeman's minus curse.

episodes.title: A Whale of a Ride: Part 1
episodes.plot: Crow challenges the newest member of the Dark Signers to a Turbo Duel, but before Crow's Blackwings can even take flight, his opponent unleashes an aerial assault of his own.

episodes.title: A Whale of a Ride: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the sky-high battle between Crow and Greiger heats up, Crow looks to elevate his game in order to ground Greiger's aerial attacks before they send him to the Netherworld forever.

episodes.title: A Whale of a Ride: Part 3
episodes.plot: With his life points on the line, Crow turns to his feathered friends in a last ditch effort to take out Greiger's Earthbound Immortal. Can Crow and his Blackwing's rise to the occasion, or will this Dark Signer's dark deck sink any chances they have of b

episodes.title: A Score to Settle: Part 1
episodes.plot: Haunted by the memories of his last battle with Kalin, Yusei looks to bury the past by agreeing to duel his former friend in a rematch. Can Yusei defeat Kalin and seal the tower that this Dark Signer is guarding, or will Kalin overcome Yusei's defenses a

episodes.title: A Score to Settle: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the rematch between Kalin and Yusei continues, Yusei must find a way to out-think and out-maneuver the dark power of Kalin's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him to the Netherworld forever.

episodes.title: Destiny's Will: Part 1
episodes.plot: Roman challenges Yusei to a Shadow Duel at the site of the original Ener-D Reactor. Meanwhile, Director Goodwin decides to make an unexpected visit to the Satellite Sector to settle some unfinished business he has with his Dark Signer brother.

episodes.title: Destiny's Will: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the battle between Yusei and Roman rages on, Roman takes a time out to reveal the truth behind the original Ener-D Reactor's meltdown and the role Yusei's father played.

episodes.title: Shadows of Doubt: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jack agrees to Turbo Duel Carly in an effort to defeat the darkness that has taken control of her. Can Jack rid the evil that has come to possess this one-time roving reporter, or will the dark powers of the Dark Signers overcome Jack and turn him into o

episodes.title: Shadows of Doubt: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jack kicks his duel into overdrive and summons his Red Dragon Archfiend in a desperate attempt to free Carly from the Dark Signers' control.

episodes.title: Truth and Consequences: Part 1
episodes.plot: Hoping to finally find out the whereabouts of her long-lost brother, Misty challenges Akiza to a Shadow Duel in a maze of mirrors.

episodes.title: Truth and Consequences: Part 2
episodes.plot: After unlocking Akiza's psychic powers, Sayer sets his sights on using them to get even with the Dark Signers for destroying the Arcadia Movement.

episodes.title: Signs of Doom: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yusei, Jack and Crow face off against Goodwin in the ultimate Shadow Duel showdown.

episodes.title: Signs of Doom: Part 2
episodes.plot: With the safety of the world hanging in the balance, Yusei, Jack and Crow look to tip the scales in their favor by setting their sights on Goodwin's Earthbound Immortal.

episodes.title: Signs of Doom: Part 3
episodes.plot: With his life points running on empty, Yusei looks to rev it up one last time in order to defeat Goodwin and save the world from the destructive powers of the King of the Netherworld!

episodes.title: On Your Mark, Get Set, Duel!
episodes.plot: Hoping to save his friends from the clutches of Sector Security, Yusei Fudo challenges his old nemesis Officer Trudge to a Turbo Duel!

episodes.title: Creepy Crawlies
episodes.plot: With his Duel Runner on the line, Yusei finds himself dueling against a bully who battles with a deck full of bugs.

episodes.title: Pipe Dreams
episodes.plot: Looking to get his Stardust Dragon card back from Jack Atlas, Yusei takes off in a race against time... and Sector Security.

episodes.title: A Blast from the Past: Part 1
episodes.plot: After making it through to New Domino City, Yusei confronts his old friend Jack Atlas and challenges him to a Turbo Duel.

episodes.title: A Blast from the Past: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the clash between Jack and Yusei comes to a climatic close, a mysterious creature appears as their two Dragons duke it out.

episodes.title: The Facility: Part 1
episodes.plot: After being sent to The Facility, Yusei befriends an odd old man who duels with a treasure deck full of ancient mystic cards.

episodes.title: The Facility: Part 2
episodes.plot: Yusei duels the top dog at The Facility using Yanagi's treasure deck. Meanwhile, Jack learns about the mystery surrounding his Mark of the Crimson Dragon.

episodes.title: Fire It Up!
episodes.plot: With Yusei still serving out his sentence at The Facility, Jack finds himself having to face off against former Turbo Duel Champion Hunter Pace in a rematch that could send Jack's career up in smoke.

episodes.title: The Lockdown Duel: Part 1
episodes.plot: After being sent to the Maximum Security Zone in The Facility, Yusei risks being permanently placed in lockdown when he decides to duel Chief Armstrong in order to win a pardon for his pal.

episodes.title: The Lockdown Duel: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the clash between Yusei and the Chief comes to a shocking conclusion, Yusei must figure out a way to win the battle before his life points get zapped to zero.

episodes.title: The Take Back: Part 1
episodes.plot: After being freed from the Facility, Yusei risks being re-incarcerated when he tries to take back his Duel Runner from Sector Security's security vault. Can Yusei sneak in and out without being detected, or will a familiar foe send him back to the Facility forever?

episodes.title: The Take Back: Part 2
episodes.plot: With Officer Trudge in hot pursuit, Yusei looks to rev his game up before the long arm of the law grabs a hold of him for good!

episodes.title: A Duel to Remember
episodes.plot: When Yusei can't remember his own name, he agrees to duel a pint-sized player named Leo in the hopes of getting his memory back.

episodes.title: Bloom of the Black Rose
episodes.plot: As Leo and his pal Dexter venture into the narrows of New Domino City to find the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose, Blister breaks out a plan to keep Yusei's friends in the Satellite Sector safe from Goodwin's goons.

episodes.title: Welcome to the Fortune Cup
episodes.plot: The stage is set for the Fortune Cup as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on the reigning champion Jack Atlas. However, for the Master of Ceremonies Rex Goodwin, it's not about who wins or loses as he has his sights set on discovering who among the eight have the Mark of the Crimson Dragon.

episodes.title: Battle with the Black Rose
episodes.plot: The second duel of the Fortune Cup is about to get under way as the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose finds herself having to face off against a medieval menace named Sir Randsborg.

episodes.title: Surprise, Surprise
episodes.plot: With the first Turbo Duel of the Fortune Cup set to start, a surprise guest forces Yusei's competition to take an unexpected pit stop.

episodes.title: Return to the Spirit World: Part 1
episodes.plot: Director Goodwin enlists the hypnotic powers of the Professor to expose Luna as a Signer and uncover the secrets she unknowingly knows of the Duel Monsters Spirit World.

episodes.title: Return to the Spirit World: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the battle between the Professor and Luna continues, Luna looks to keep a promise she made to protect the Duel Monsters Spirit World, but in order for her to succeed, she must first break free of the hypnotic hold the Professor has on her.

episodes.title: Second Round Showdown: Part 1
episodes.plot: The semifinals of the Fortune Cup are about to begin, and the first match of day two features Yusei going toe-to-toe with the tower of power - Greiger! With Greiger riding the most powerful runner ever built, Yusei will have to rev it up or run the risk of getting his life points run over.

episodes.title: Second Round Showdown: Part 2
episodes.plot: With no cards left in his hand and his life points about to get blasted by Greiger, Yusei has one draw left to take down this tower of power to keep in the hunt to duel Jack in the championship round.

episodes.title: The Profiler
episodes.plot: In the second battle of the semifinals, Akiza squares off against the professional profiler Commander Koda, but with her tournament life on the line, can Akiza outplay an opponent who claims to know her every move, or will her past help the profiler pick her game apart?

episodes.title: Duel of the Dragons: Part 1
episodes.plot: With the Fortune Cup Finale one win away, Yusei and Akiza get set to battle it out as Director Goodwin anxiously awaits the final Signer to reveal their Mark of the Dragon.

episodes.title: Duel of the Dragons: Part 2
episodes.plot: As the back-and-forth battle between Akiza and Yusei rages on, Yusei is forced to unleash his mighty Stardust Dragon in order to stop Akiza's grisly garden from squeezing his life points into submission.

episodes.title: The Fortune Cup Finale: Part 1
episodes.plot: With the Fortune Cup Finale about to kick into overdrive, Jack decides to clear the air and reveal the truth behind his escape from the Satellite Sector.

episodes.title: The Fortune Cup Finale: Part 2
episodes.plot: With the finish line of the Fortune Cup fast approaching, Yusei and Jack find themselves on a collision course with destiny as they race to unlock the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon.
